snippet: Matt Lampson had eight saves for his third straight shutout and the Chicago Fire held on for a scoreless draw with New York City F.C..
abstract: Chicago Fire and New York City Football Club play to scoreless tie at Yankee Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Matt Lampson had eight saves for his third straight shutout and the Chicago Fire held on for a scoreless draw with New York City F.C..
